com.siemens.ct.exi
Interface EXIBodyEncoder

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractEXIBodyEncoder, EXIBodyEncoderInOrder, EXIBodyEncoderInOrderSC, EXIBodyEncoderReordered
public interface EXIBodyEncoder

Internal EXI Encoder interface to transform XML events to an EXI stream.

Version:
0.7
Author:
Daniel.Peintner.EXT@siemens.com, Joerg.Heuer@siemens.com
